title: Standardized score for Canadian and U.S. dollars

content.question: For which of the following will the value of the statistic for the annual sales in Canadian dollars be equal to the value of the corresponding statistic in United States dollars?

choices.label: The standard deviation of the annual sales
The standardized score of the minimum annual sales
The interquartile range of the annual sales

content.answer: The standardized score of the minimum annual sales

topic.text: 1.7: Summary Statistics for a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
